alerts.title: Alert: {{alertType}}
alerts.footer: This is an automated message from Workix.

digest.title: {{period}} Digest Report
digest.footer: This is an automated digest from Workix.

password_reset.email_sent: If an account exists with this email, a password reset link will be sent
password_reset.too_many_requests: Too many password reset requests. Please try again later.
password_reset.success: Password has been reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.
password_reset.token_expired: Password reset token has expired. Please request a new one.
password_reset.token_used: Reset token not found or already used

email_verification.token_expired: Email verification token has expired. Please request a new one.
email_verification.token_used: Verification token not found or already used
email_verification.no_pending: No pending verification found for this email
email_verification.max_resends_exceeded: Maximum resend attempts exceeded. Please contact support.
email_verification.resend_cooldown: Please wait {{seconds}} seconds before resending verification email
email_verification.resend_success: Verification email resent successfully ({{remaining}} resends remaining)

auth.account_locked: Account is locked. Try again later

password_validation.min_length: Password must be at least 12 characters

oauth.email_required: Email is required from OAuth provider
oauth.cannot_unlink_no_password: Cannot unlink social account: user must have a password set first

phone_otp.too_many_requests: Too many OTP requests. Try again later.
phone_otp.no_active_otp: No active OTP found for this phone number
phone_otp.too_many_failed_attempts: Too many failed attempts. Try again later.
phone_otp.expired: OTP has expired. Request a new one.
phone_otp.email_required: Email is required for registration with phone OTP

rbac.cannot_change_system_role_level: Cannot change level of system role

avatar.invalid_file_type: Only JPEG, PNG, and WebP images are allowed

users.user_id_and_avatar_required: User ID and avatar URL are required

pipelines.name_and_steps_required: Pipeline name and steps are required
pipelines.must_have_at_least_one_step: Pipeline must have at least one step
pipelines.no_access: You do not have access to this pipeline
pipelines.can_only_update_own: You can only update your own pipelines
pipelines.can_only_delete_own: You can only delete your own pipelines
pipelines.can_only_publish_own: You can only publish your own pipelines
pipelines.can_only_manage_own: You can only manage your own pipelines

service_discovery.name_url_port_required: Service name, URL, and port are required
